Ultra Mobile - Senior Software Engineer - Costa Mesa, CA - Full-time, Onsite

Ultra Mobile is a company dedicated to creating innovative, authentic mobile communication experiences for people around the globe. We offer communication plans that break down barriers and allow our customers to easily and affordably connect with their communities – no matter where they may be.

WHAT YOU'll DO: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our Engineering team. You’ll be an individual contributor who will take an active role in software design and software delivery.

ABOUT THE ROLE: Software Design and Development of prototypes and tools that crosses full stack - from UI, DevOps, Backend, Data Services, etc. Passionate, understanding, and continual learning of best practices, both in process and development. A software language polyglot -experience with multiple languages and to know when to pick the best tools. Ability to be assigned a problem and take ownership with minimal guidance. Highly motivated self-learner

Apply: https://careers.ultramobile.com/
